item.title: Deploying a Windows Azure VM with Hashicorp Terraform to Microsoft Azure
item.description: As a followup to my previous post on Automating EC2 deployments, I figured why not show how this can also be done with Microsoft Azure? Check out how to launch an Azure VM instance and run some scripts to customize your installation.
